title: Seducing Carma
description: [Siren Menage Erotic Consensual BDSM Menage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, paddling, flogging, sex toys, HEA] Carma Mandanici is forced to confront her abusive past when an uncle she barely knows leaves her a large amount of money. But Mateo has a tragedy in his own past that he must confront before he can become a Dom to Carma, or allow himself to fall in love with her. Blaine Peterson and Mateo have been friends since they met as freshmen in college. Blaine left behind a secret that involves his ex-submissive when he moved to Passion Peak to take a lucrative job and start over. He's falling in love with Carma, right along with Mateo. But when his secret catches up with him, he might lose both his friendship with Mateo, and the one woman he can't live without. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Tara  Rose
